name: CyberHarbor
description: CyberHarbor is a multi-chain decentralized monitoring network that detects threats and anomalies on DeFi, oracles, governance, cross-chain bridges and other Web3 systems in real time by scanning transactions and block-by-block state changes.CyberHarbor scores tokens and establishes a clearer security analysis chart through dimensions such as token transaction information, holder information, and short-term security testing.
